reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's style, particularly appreciating how the bow detailing adds a feminine touch and its reversible design.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and Stylish Bow Sweater!
items.body: This Women’s Bow Sweater is absolutely adorable! The cropped fit and V-neck give it such a cute, flattering look, and the bow detailing adds the perfect feminine touch. It’s soft, comfortable, and easy to dress up or down — I’ve already gotten so many compliments wearing it! One thing to note is that the knit has gaps between the bows that are see-through. It’s not a deal breaker at all, but you may want to pair it with an undershirt or cami for a little extra coverage. Overall, it’s a stylish, unique sweater that looks great and feels great. I love it and would definitely recommend it! Read more
items.author: Kimberly Zollman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sweater
items.body: This sweater is literally to die for! It just did not work for me unfortunately because I am pregnant. If I Was not pregnant I would have absolutely kept it. The length is perfect and hits right above your pant line so you get the longer look without the awkward long length and oversized to big look. It is soft and warm and trendy, very cute on. You. could wear it to a fashionable dinner or also just a hang out girls night it is a very versatile piece. Shape was very flattering it wasn't to tight and not to loose where it looked weird. I think the value for the money was absolutely there. Read more
items.author: Ashley Long

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and perfect length
items.body: Length is perfect with high waisted jean. Fabric is soft and feminine. Beautifully packaged and practically wrinkle free. The bows are tied perfectly. I’m a little concerned about how this will wash. Definitely by hand, dry flat and shape those bows. I’m really happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Renee Marcus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and True to Size — Wife Loved It
items.body: I got this for my wife and she absolutely loved it. It fit her perfectly and looked just like the pictures. The bow detail is really cute and gives it a fun, stylish look without being over the top. It was true to size and the material felt soft and comfortable. She looked amazing in it and has already asked for it in another color. Read more
items.author: Jesse Lemery

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buy at your own risk
items.body: This is a cute sweater but it looks nothing like what I thought I was ordering Very short and a red not a soft muted burgundy Read more
items.author: samantha thornton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and fit were great!
items.body: This sweater looked so cute on my teen for family photos. Definitely needs a cami underneath as it doesn’t fully close. It’s very soft too. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute!
items.body: This is such a cute sweater! The material feels very luxe and is super soft. Great price for the quality of sweater. I thought the size and fit is true to size. Read more
items.author: Chloe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality
items.body: Great quality material and a nice, loose fit that’s very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Alicia R Turner

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sky Blue, Brown, Pink, White, Beige, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Grey, Dark Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
